articles.title: MBTA releases World Cup transit guide as Boston braces for 450,000 visitors
articles.description:
The T expects to carry up to 20,000 riders per match during the 2026 FIFA World Cup, with seven games scheduled at Gillette Stadium.

articles.title: Harvard Hillel places Orthodox rabbi on leave
articles.description:
Harvard Hill placed the rabbi and his wife on administrative leave pending an investigation into “serious violations” of HR policies.
